verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥ח <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician בִּנְגִינֹ֗ת <S%H5068><s%> offer freely מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm שִֽׁיר׃ <S%H7892><s%> [or] Song אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> God יְחָנֵּ֥נוּ <S%H2603><s%> be merciful וִֽיבָרְכֵ֑נוּ <S%H1288><s%> unto us and bless יָ֤אֵ֥ר <S%H215><s%> to shine פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> us [and] cause his face אִתָּ֣נוּ <S%H854><s%> against סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> upon us Selah

לָדַ֣עַת <S%H3045><s%> may be known בָּאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon earth דַּרְכֶּ֑ךָ <S%H1870><s%> That thy way בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גּ֝וֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> among all nations יְשׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3444><s%> thy saving health

יוֹד֖וּךָ <S%H3034><s%> praise עַמִּ֥ים ׀ <S%H5971><s%> Let the people אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> thee O God י֝וֹד֗וּךָ <S%H3034><s%> praise עַמִּ֥ים <S%H5971><s%> let all the people כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

יִֽשְׂמְח֥וּ <S%H8055><s%> be glad וִֽירַנְּנ֗וּ <S%H7442><s%> and sing for joy לְאֻ֫מִּ֥ים <S%H3816><s%> O let the nations כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for תִשְׁפֹּ֣ט <S%H8199><s%> for thou shalt judge עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> the people מִישׁ֑וֹר <S%H4334><s%> righteously וּלְאֻמִּ֓ים ׀ <S%H3816><s%> the nations בָּאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> upon earth תַּנְחֵ֣ם <S%H5148><s%> and govern סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

יוֹד֖וּךָ <S%H3034><s%> praise עַמִּ֥ים ׀ <S%H5971><s%> Let the people אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> thee O God י֝וֹד֗וּךָ <S%H3034><s%> praise עַמִּ֥ים <S%H5971><s%> let all the people כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

אֶ֭רֶץ <S%H776><s%> [Then] shall the earth נָתְנָ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> yield יְבוּלָ֑הּ <S%H2981><s%> her increase יְ֝בָרְכֵ֗נוּ <S%H1288><s%> shall bless אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> [and] God אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> [even] our own God

יְבָרְכֵ֥נוּ <S%H1288><s%> shall bless אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> God וְיִֽירְא֥וּ <S%H3372><s%> shall fear אֹ֝ת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אַפְסֵי־ <S%H657><s%> us and all the ends אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth
